name: User Authentication
description: Users should be able to log in to their account using valid credentials.

versions.name: Currency Selection
versions.description: Users should be able to select their preferred currency from a dropdown menu.

versions.name: User Account Access
versions.description: Users should be able to access their account section through a dedicated link.

versions.name: Wish List Functionality
versions.description: Users should be able to add products to a wish list and view their wish list count.

versions.name: Shopping Cart Management
versions.description: Users should be able to view and access their shopping cart with item count and total amount.

name: Shopping Cart
description: Users should be able to view and manage items in their shopping cart with item count and total amount.

name: Payment Processing
description: The system should securely process payments through multiple payment methods.

name: Product Search
description: Users should be able to search for products using a search box with search button.

name: Checkout Process
description: Users should be able to proceed to checkout through a dedicated link.

name: Product Category Navigation
description: Users should be able to browse products by predefined categories through a navigation menu.

name: Featured Products Display
description: The system should display featured products on the homepage with images, descriptions, and prices.

name: Product Add to Cart
description: Users should be able to add products to their shopping cart directly from product listings.

name: Product Add to Wish List
description: Users should be able to add products to their wish list directly from product listings.

name: Product Comparison
description: Users should be able to add products to comparison from product listings.

name: Product Price Display
description: Product listings should display both original and discounted prices when applicable.

name: Brand Showcase
description: The system should display partner/brand logos in a showcase area on the homepage.

name: Product Carousel
description: The system should display featured products or promotions in a carousel with navigation controls.

name: Responsive Design
description: The website should be responsive and adapt to different screen sizes and devices.

name: Account Registration Form
description: The system shall provide a registration form with fields for first name, last name, email, telephone, and password to allow new users to create an account.

name: Required Registration Fields
description: The account registration form shall clearly mark required fields with an asterisk (*) and validate these fields before submission.

name: Account Sidebar Navigation
description: The account pages shall include a sidebar navigation menu with links to Login, Register, Forgotten Password, My Account, Address Book, Wish List, Order History, Downloads, Recurring Payments, Reward Points, Returns, Transactions, and Newsletter.

name: Newsletter Subscription Option
description: The account registration form shall include radio buttons for users to opt in or out of the newsletter subscription with 'No' selected by default.

name: Privacy Policy Consent
description: The account registration form shall include a checkbox for users to confirm they have read and agree to the Privacy Policy, with a link to view the policy.

name: Registration Password Confirmation
description: The account registration form shall include both 'Password' and 'Password Confirm' fields to verify the user has entered their intended password correctly.

name: Registration Continue Button
description: The account registration form shall include a prominent 'Continue' button that submits the form once all required fields are completed and validated.

name: Existing Account Login Prompt
description: The registration page shall include a message informing users with existing accounts to log in at the login page, with a link to that page.

name: Breadcrumb Navigation
description: All pages shall include breadcrumb navigation showing the path from home to the current page, allowing users to track their location and navigate backward in the hierarchy.

name: Wishlist Management
description: The system shall provide a wishlist functionality allowing logged-in users to save products for future consideration, with product images, names, models, stock information, pricing, and action buttons.

name: Wishlist Add to Cart
description: The wishlist page shall provide 'Add to Cart' buttons for each product, allowing users to easily purchase items from their wishlist.

name: Wishlist Remove Function
description: The wishlist page shall provide 'Remove' buttons for each product, allowing users to delete items from their wishlist.

name: Wishlist Stock Display
description: The wishlist page shall display the current stock availability for each product, informing users of product availability before they add items to cart.

name: Shopping Cart Detail View
description: The shopping cart page shall display a detailed list of all added products, including images, product names, models, quantities, unit prices, and total prices per item.

name: Shopping Cart Quantity Update
description: The shopping cart shall allow users to update product quantities directly from the cart page, with refresh and remove buttons for each product.

name: Shopping Cart Weight Display
description: The shopping cart shall display the total weight of all products in the cart (e.g., in kg), to inform shipping calculations.

name: Cart Price Calculation
description: The shopping cart shall calculate and display sub-total, taxes (including specific taxes like Eco Tax and VAT with percentages), and the final total amount.

name: Stock Availability Warning
description: The shopping cart shall display warning messages for products that are not available in the desired quantity or out of stock, with clear visual indicators.

name: Coupon Code Functionality
description: The shopping cart shall provide a collapsible section allowing users to enter and apply coupon codes to their order.

name: Shipping Estimation
description: The shopping cart shall provide a collapsible section allowing users to estimate shipping and taxes based on their location before proceeding to checkout.

name: Cart Navigation Options
description: The shopping cart page shall provide both 'Continue Shopping' and 'Checkout' buttons, allowing users to either return to shopping or proceed with the purchase.
